title: The Breath Of Light
lyrics:
I see him dive towards me
Thru an angelic canopy
And when he sounds patience breath
He pours himself into my lungs
My saviour has come
What's luck?

What luck got to say to questions of fate

My love?

For I have been trying my best just to keep up above

And I'd be lying if I said

Never question what it is worth?

'Cause I am trying, I am trying but I am dying

I feel life break beneath the waves

But I won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me down, no more

I breathe the breath of light



See her rise with beauty

Indifferent to mortality

Holding my severed wrists

Like a mountain made to fall

She collapses in a motion to drown me

And I would not take this breath

If he had not dove down and found me

For I have been trying my best to keep, keep up above

And I'd be lying if I said

Never question what it is worth?

'Cause I am trying, I am trying but I am dying

I feel life break beneath the waves

But I won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold meLUH - The breath of light

[Lost Under Heaven]

I see him dive towards me

Thru an angelic canopy

And when he sounds patience breath

He pours himself into my lungs

My saviour has come

What's luck?

What luck got to say to questions of fate

My love?

For I have been trying my best just to keep up above

And I'd be lying if I said

Never question what it is worth?

'Cause I am trying, I am trying but I am dying

I feel life break beneath the waves

But I won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me down, no more

I breathe the breath of light



See her rise with beauty

Indifferent to mortality

Holding my severed wrists

Like a mountain made to fall

She collapses in a motion to drown me

And I would not take this breath

If he had not dove down and found me

For I have been trying my best to keep, keep up above

And I'd be lying if I said

Never question what it is worth?

'Cause I am trying, I am trying but I am dying

I feel life break beneath the waves

But I won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

It's all I got

& its enough to breath the dyin light of love

(Iron walls of waves are breakin over me)

It's all I got

& its enough to breath the dyin light of love

(Iron walls of waves are breakin over me)



No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me

No, won't let them hold me no more

I'm breathing breath of light
